TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlace extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents an entry in a custom place collection for Windows Vista.

span.span: Represents an entry in a custom place collection for Windows Vista.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]의 기본 열기 및 저장 대화 상자 왼쪽에는 **즐겨찾기 링크**라는 영역이 있습니다.The default open and save dialog boxes on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] have an area on the left side of the dialog box titled **Favorite Links**. 이 영역을 사용자 지정 위치라고 합니다.This area is called custom places. 이 클래스는 사용자 지정 위치를 나타냅니다.This class represents a custom place. [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] 또는 [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)],이 클래스는 아무 영향이 없습니다.On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid knownFolderGuid) cil managed

param.name: knownFolderGuid
param.span: A that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.

span.span: A that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a custom place identified by a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a custom place identified by a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 사용 가능한 목록은 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 알려진 폴더 참조 [파일 대화 상자의 사용자 지정 위치에 대 한 알려진 폴더 Guid](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) 또는 KnownFolders.h 파일에는 [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]합니다.For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 이 예제를 실행 하려면 Windows Form과 호출에 다음 코드를 붙여 `InitializeDialogAndButton` 폼의 생성자 또는 이벤트 처리 메서드.To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

value.span: A 나타내는 [! 사용자 지정 위치에 대 한 알려진 폴더 INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]입니다.

value.span: 사용 가능한 목록은 [! 알려진 폴더 INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 참조 [파일 대화 상자 사용자 지정 Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) 또는 KnownFolders.h 파일에 대 한 알려진 폴더 Guid는 [! INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]입니다.
